div.span: District Updates: Schools Closed Indefinitely-Distance Learning Continues
div.div: For more information, please navigate to the District's COVID-19 Update page for the latest announcements and news.read more ❯

main.div: You are here: Home / District Departments / Nursing Services / Coronavirus Updates

span.strong: ls Closed - Monday, March 16, 2020 - Friday, April 17, 2020
span.em: [All South Orange & Maplewood School District facilities are closed and all extracurricular, registration, athletic, and social activities are postponed/canceled until further notice]

div.p: The South Orange & Maplewood School District is closely monitoring the ongoing coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak. We are continuing to receive and share further guidance from the state, local and federal agencies as it relates to COVID-19.

ul.li: New Jersey 24-Hour Coronavirus Hotline: The 24-hour statewide hotline for answering questions about the novel coronavirus is (1-800-222-1222). This hotline provides updated, factual information. New Jersey is continuing to work closely with the CDC and local health partners to monitor the situation and will provide updates accordingly.

div.p: The South Orange & Maplewood School District is committed to making our content accessible to all members of the public, including those with disabilities. This includes parents, students, employees, and all others associated with our district. If you need assistance in accessing materials on the district website or you would like to provide feedback or file a complaint about the website, please email the webmaster.

The mission of the South Orange Maplewood School District is to empower and inspire each student to explore and imagine, to pursue personal passions, and to collectively create a better future by creating a learner-centered environment through multiple pathways; re-imagined structures, systems and supports; innovative teaching; partnering with families; and maximizing community expertise and resources.
